0010100001100100 1000100010010110 0 -> sum: 1011000011111010, cout: 0
0110011001111011 1000110111011011 0 -> sum: 1111010001010110, cout: 0
1001111100011010 1000000000101001 0 -> sum: 0001111101000011, cout: 1
0101010000110110 1101110100000100 0 -> sum: 0011000100111010, cout: 1
1111111001110110 1110101010111100 1 -> sum: 1110100100110011, cout: 1
1101111010010110 0010100111001101 1 -> sum: 0000100001100100, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
